attributes.action: Pressure world leader and countries to ban all live animal markets
attributes.background: Speak to countries like China to ban the sale of live animals that are being sold in dirty and in regulated markets

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you want to ban all trade of live animals or just in certain circumstances. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
